name: Victory Dance
description:
The web build above works well, but the standalone downloads below look much better!

Jam game for Toy Box Jam 3. A digital board game for exactly 4 players, influenced by Dirk Henn's Shogun and other board games. Developed in Godot. I will write better instructions soon.

Controls with the mouse. Use WASD to move the camera, and right-click and drag to look around.

The game is technically able to be completed, but my scope was far too large. About 40% of the mechanisms are missing, and the game is unpolished. It also has no tutorial.

This jam game was developed on Godot. The source code is available at https://bitbucket.org/frnknstn/toy-box-jam-3/
